reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Paul Dini is back and it feels like he has never left. This collection adapts Under the Red Hood and, partially, Knightfall into the DCAU continuity and it is as always lovely. A great companion to the show and the beginning of something awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for grandson per his request.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The Animated Series has finished.Long Live the Adventures Continue.There's all the Class of the 'Series ', and yes, I am hearing the voices in my head.I'm not ready for Arkham yet though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars An extension of the beloved TV series, but...
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes feels like a nostalgia cash grab. Without diminishing the efforts of the team involved. Sometimes it feel off. This comic tries to introduce characters that weren't available in the original series run, trying to capture the tone of the original, but as visual as both mediums can be, the painted grainy photography of the series is la king in this mostly clean and brighter interpretation.Besides that, I might still give it a try to the second volume, but it can be better if put more attention to the visual detail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great continuation of the animated series
reviews.reviewText: The comic was great and felt like a natural continuation of the show. The issues read and play out just like episodes of it. The only real downsides to it is I wish it was longer, and there are a couple modern pop culture references that feel very out of place. Other than that it is great and a very good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic continuation of the animated series. It takes the format and art style from that series and brings newer Batman stories into the fold (i.e. the Red Hood). Great writing and art. So excited to read Vol. 2!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reminds me of my childhood cartoon.
reviews.reviewText: The writing and the art are all a flashback and a step forward in what we fans call the Timmverse. I always liked their take on Scarface and Wesker and the last story didn't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an awesome comeback to BTAS that iv always wished for!
reviews.reviewText: I love it, even though it wont beat the actual animated series on screen, but for its printed paper goodness medium, it's beautiful and it's always what i believe most fans of BTAS would desire for!

reviews.reviewTitle: UMA ÓTIMA SEQUÊNCIA DA SÉRIE ANIMADA
reviews.reviewText: Comprei esperando histórias que servissem como sequencia da série animada, e foi exatamente o que encontrei! Historias criadas pelos roteiristas da série, Paul Dini e Alan Burnett, com desenhos de Ty Templeton que emulam o traço caracteristico de Bruce Timm. Adorei a forma como os roteiros introduzem personagens que (infelizmente) não tiveram a chance de aparecer no desenho, como Exterminador, Azrael, e o Capuz Vermelho, cuja história é o ponto alto do encadernado. E não se enganem, não é porque é adaptação do desenho que a trama pega leve nas cenas de violência.Recomendo fortemente para todos os fãs do herói e da série animada.Espero que algum dia a Warner faça uma continuação, nem que seja em forma de minissérie, da animação, seria uma boa pra aproveitar o "revival" de produções dos anos 90.

I love and adore this comic series, I’m a huge lover of the animated series it’s based on and it was soooo much like watching the series and I couldn’t help myself but read it in the voices or imagine it lol one thing I’ll point out is the random moment where scarecrow was in his OG outfit and then bam later on in his 2nd version of his outfit which this series is set after s4 so why did that happen? That a small thing though if you love the show then you won’t be disappointed at all with this! 10/10
Ich habe mich die ganze Zeit super unterhalten gefühlt und es schließt sehr gut an die alte TV Serie an!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Loved this. It's the books and cartoon of my childhood back in the world. It's like a warm blanket of nostalgia, but less cringey than that sounds as Paul Dini and Ty Templeton are too good for that.

reviews.reviewTitle: IL SERVIZIO NON MI E' PIACIUTO
reviews.reviewText: Sulla qualità dei disegni non discuto. Sono stupendi. Ma do tre stelle perché non mi e piaciuto il fatto di trovare attaccate direttamente sul volume le etichette di Amazon Warehouse.
